explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of supervised machine learning techniques to build empirical robustness prediction models.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper focuses on using supervised machine learning techniques for predicting the robustness of dynamic loop scheduling algorithms.
explanations.classification: The prediction models could involve classification tasks to categorize the robustness of different scheduling algorithms.
explanations.regression: The prediction models could also involve regression tasks to predict the performance metrics of scheduling algorithms.
